La Cucanya

Since 1979 La Cucanya has been working on the value of three main ingredients: Tradition, Proximity and Quality. In each new season they create a menu that comes with new proposals and creations with a selection of their classics.

The restaurant is located just next to Vilanova beach, it has three different dinning rooms all of them with a lot of natural light and seaviews. It is surounded by beautiful gardens, perfect for a relaxed welcome drink

Location: Vilanova Beach

Dining room capacities: 80, 120 and 240pax

Price Level: average-high

Style: MMediterranean cuisine

Vegetarian Options/Special diets: Available

Handicapped facilities: Yes
